items.content_html:
This PR removes the flip_and_angle member of the image-orientation CSS property from BCD. Per the data guidelines, this feature can be considered irrelevant and may be removed from BCD accordingly. Even if the current data suggests that the feature is supported, lack of support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v10.10.9).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/image-orientation/flip_and_angle
items.title: Remove css.properties.image-orientation.flip_and_angle from BCD

items.content_html:
This PR removes the scrollbar-*-color CSS properties from BCD. Per the data guidelines, this feature can be considered irrelevant and may be removed from BCD accordingly. Even if the current data suggests that the feature is supported, lack of support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v10.10.9).

Tests Used:
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/scrollbar-3dlight-color
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/scrollbar-arrow-color
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/scrollbar-base-color
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/scrollbar-darkshadow-color
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/scrollbar-face-color
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/scrollbar-highlight-color
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/scrollbar-shadow-color

Additional Notes: These were all IE-only properties.
items.title: Remove scrollbar-*-color CSS property from BCD

items.content_html:

Even if the current data suggests that the feature is supported, lack of support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v10.10.9).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/align-tracks

Additional Notes: This had only been supported in Firefox behind a flag, and the Chrome bug has not progressed.
items.title: Remove align-tracks CSS property from BCD

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for Microsoft Edge for the forced-color-adjust CSS property. The data comes from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v10.10.9).

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/forced-color-adjust
items.title: Update Edge data for forced-color-adjust CSS property
